forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
